April 5, 1981 D Watney's London Festival (Championship Section)
Watney's London Festival (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Watney's London Festival watney-s-london-festival-championship-section
None
Variations on the Shining River
Watford Colosseum, Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK British Bandsman 11/04/1981 states 'According to all reports the Watneys London Brass Band Festival, successor to the Lansing Bagnall Festival etc. This must therefore be the first one as Lansing Bagnall was held in 1980. Prizes - 1st £500 and trophy, 2nd £250 and trophy, 3rd £100 and trophy. 13 bands competed.
